name: Hennriette
description:
-~*~-

Hennriette is an atmospheric 2D Pixel Platformer, in which you play a hen with the same name. You join her on an Adventure through a small  town called 'Altklausen'.

-~*~-

AbilityKeyboardGamepadSelectLeft MousebuttonEast ButtonMoveA & DLeft StickJumpTap spaceTap South ButtonGlideHold SpaceHold South Button

-~*~-

Music: Storybook - Jo Wandrini (Epidemic Sounds)

Sounds: WeLoveIndies

-~*~-

Emotional Support: Yunus,  Fuko el Muko, KuchenHusky, Synix,  Sesoul, Josh/Joy, Ricardo

-~*~-
